contextId.information: This is the name of a man sent by the Philippian church to minister to Paul in prison. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
These are women who were believers and helped Paul in the church at Philippi. AT: "I beg Euodia, and I beg Syntyche" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
contextId.quote: I am pleading with Euodia, and I am pleading with Syntyche
